summary: Pettersson, a director in the porn industry, is traveling around the country with two rather coarse strippers and a gay flasher. Then he meets Henrietta and falls in love.
cast: Janne Carlsson|Eva Kristin Tangen|Svante Grundberg|Claire Wikholm|Per Oscarsson|Gunnar 'Knas' Lindkvist|Ulf Johansson|Lars Dejert|Malou Berg|Patricia Gehlin|Margaret Bykoff
title: Henrietta
